trans-unit.source: Defines the abstract base class for composable parts, which import objects and produce exported objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> class.
Called when all the imports of the part have been set, and exports can be retrieved.
Once this method is called, no further imports can be set unless a call is made to Deactivate.
Gets a collection of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition"></xref> objects that describe the exported objects provided by the part.

If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> object was created from a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> object, this property should return the result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition.ExportDefinitions%2A>.
Overrides of this property should never return `null`.
If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> does not have exports, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection instead.

A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition"></xref> objects that describe the exported objects provided by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> object has been disposed of.
Gets the exported object described by the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition"></xref> object.

One of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart.ExportDefinitions"></xref> property that describes the exported object to return.
The exported object described by definition.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> object has been disposed of.
definition is `null`.
An error occurred getting the exported object described by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition"></xref>.
definition did not originate from the property on the .
One or more prerequisite imports, indicated by <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.IsPrerequisite"></xref>, have not been set.
Gets a collection of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref> objects that describe the imported objects required by the part.

If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> object was created from a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> object, this property should return the result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition.ImportDefinitions%2A>.
Overrides of this property should never return `null`.
If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> does not have imports, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection instead.

A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref> objects that describe the imported objects required by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> object has been disposed of.
Gets the metadata of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> object.

If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> object was created from a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> object, this property should return the result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition.Metadata%2A>.

Overrides of this property should return a read-only <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object with a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparer, such as <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>, and should never return `null`.
If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> does not contain metadata, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> instead.
The metadata of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> object.
The default is an empty, read-only <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> object has been disposed of.
Sets the import described by the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref> object to be satisfied by the specified exports.
One of the objects from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart.ImportDefinitions"></xref> property that specifies the import to be set.
A collection of objects of which to set the import described by definition.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> object has been disposed of.
definition is `null`.
-or-
exports is `null`.
An error occurred setting the import described by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref> object.
definition did not originate from the property on the .
-or-
exports contains an element that is `null`.
-or-
exports is empty and is .
-or-
exports contains more than one element and is or .

<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart.SetImport(System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export})"></xref> has been previously called and <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.IsRecomposable"></xref> is `false`.
